body:
when using spack and when building the hipblas and hipsparse ,it is found that  inside the CMakeCache.txt. there are some /opt/rocm references whenever there is rocm installation. The changes in the PR will address these issues.
for hipblas -it was showing up as below-
ROCM_DIR:PATH=/opt/rocm/share/rocm/cmake
HIP_run_hipcc:INTERNAL=/opt/rocm/hip/cmake/FindHIP/run_hipcc.cmake
HIP_run_make2cmake:INTERNAL=/opt/rocm/hip/cmake/FindHIP/run_make2cmake.cmake
and for hipsparse-
HIP_run_hipcc:INTERNAL=/opt/rocm/hip/cmake/FindHIP/run_hipcc.cmake
HIP_run_make2cmake:INTERNAL=/opt/rocm/hip/cmake/FindHIP/run_make2cmake.cmake
title: cleanup opt-rocm references when using spack
